alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 10:01PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Itawamba, east central Lee, southern Tishomingo and southeastern Prentiss Counties through 1045 PM CST... At 1001 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fulton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fulton, Red Bay, Tishomingo State Park, Belmont, Mantachie, Tishomingo, Fairview, Burton, Midway, Sandy Springs, Clay, Golden, Paden, Abney, Eastman, Dennis, Mooreville, Eggville, Ballardsville and Carter Branch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
